languages.text: At the start of combat and whenever this death cultist ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> stacks of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
В начале боя и конце своего хода получает (AGI Bonus / 2) стаков баффа.

languages.text: В начале боя, а также по завершении своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} этот культист смерти получает +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u> уровней {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}скользящего пируэта{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever this death cultist ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> stacks of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В начале боя, а также по завершении своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} этот культист смерти получает +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u> уровней {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}скользящего пируэта{/g}.

В начале боя, а также по завершении своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} этот культист смерти получает +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u> уровней {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}скользящего пируэта{/g}.

languages.text: Al principio del combate y cada vez que el cultista de la muerte termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u> acumulaciones de {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}pirueta evasiva{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever this death cultist ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> stacks of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del combate y cada vez que el cultista de la muerte termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u> acumulaciones de {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}pirueta evasiva{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘開始時およびこの死のカルトが{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終えるたび、彼らは+<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2）</u>スタックの{g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}回避ピルエット{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever this death cultist ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> stacks of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘開始時およびこの死のカルトが{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終えるたび、彼らは+<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2）</u>スタックの{g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}回避ピルエット{/g}を得る。

languages.text: 在战斗开始时，以及每当这位拜死教教徒结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，都会获得<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>层{g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}闪避舞踏{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever this death cultist ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> stacks of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 在战斗开始时，以及每当这位拜死教教徒结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，都会获得<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>层{g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}闪避舞踏{/g}效果。

languages.text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes und am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} es dieses Todeskultisten erhält er +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> Stapel {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}Ausweichpirouette{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever this death cultist ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> stacks of {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}evasive pirouette{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes und am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}es dieses Todeskultisten erhält er +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> Stapel {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}Ausweichpirouette{/g}.

languages.text: Au début du combat et chaque fois que ce cultiste de la mort finit son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u> cumuls de {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}Pirouette d'esquive{/g}.

languages.text: Bu ölüm tarikatçısı, çatışma başladığında veya {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} her sonlandırdığında +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ÇEV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} / 2)</u> kadar {g|f:3cd9c0cb6ed643969618dc333e38400d}kaçamaklı pirüet{/g} birikimi kazanır.
